data.value: The text that appears in the "about me" section of a book. In applications this is the primary introduction. Should be 2-4 sentences long.

data.value: Street of delivery or invoice address

data.name: AddressBook_Zip_ZipCode_Helptext
data.value: The post code of the address

data.name: AddressBook_Default_Default_Address_Helptext
data.value: The default address is the preselected address on check out.

data.name: Application_ApplicationName_Application_Helptext
data.value: Application text, a more verbose "about me" paragraph.

data.name: MarketingPackage_Name_Package_Name_Helptext
data.value: The packages name for further reference. Used internally only.

data.name: MarketingPackage_ShareContent_Content_Sharing_Permitted_Helptext
data.value: Other authors can ask to use this content. This still requires an explicit permission and the platform takes care to share revenues as well.

data.name: MarketingPackage_PackageBasePrice_Package_Price_Helptext
data.value: The price the author has to pay for all services included in this package.

data.name: MarketingPackage_CreateRssFeed_Create_Feed_Helptext
data.value: Create a RSS feed and provide a permanent URL for same.

data.name: MarketingPackage_CreateSocialPlatformInstances_Create_Platform_Support_Helptext
data.value: Provide support on social network platforms, such as Facebook.

data.name: MarketingPackage_RegisterForLibraries_Register_for_Library_Helptext
data.value: If activated the content is being published to public library catalogs where available.

data.name: MarketingPackage_AssignIsbnADOI_Assign_ADOI_ISBN_Helptext
data.value: Assign a ADOI ISBN to the package from our internal pool.

data.name: MarketingPackage_AssignIsbn_Assign_ISBN_Helptext
data.value: Assign a ISBN from our internal pool.

data.name: MarketingPackage_BasePrice_Base_Price_Helptext
data.value: The base price - authors will get 100% of this value. Production cost might be added by the platform automatically.

data.name: MarketingPackage_Description_Package_Description_Helptext
data.value: Internally used description for this package.

data.name: MarketingPackage_LimitCountries_Limit_Countries_Helptext
data.value: Limit the publishing procedure based on this package to particular countries. If empty we'll distribute worldwide.

data.name: Milestone_DateDue_Due_Date__Deadline__Helptext
data.value: The due date (deadline) for this milestone. Milestones automatically become overdue after passing this date.

data.name: Milestone_Name_Name_Helptext
data.value: A common name for the milestone. This is visible to users.

data.name: Milestone_Owner_Responsible_Team_Member_Helptext
data.value: The responsible team member fo that milestone. Can be changed later if member is not yet aboard.

data.name: Milestone_Description_Description_Helptext
data.value: A description for this milestone. Users see this a tooltip or help hint.

data.name: Milestone_Comment_Comments_Helptext
data.value: The comments the user has entered when changing the milestone's progress.

data.name: Milestone_Progress_Progress_Helptext
data.value: The current progress made, a percentage value and optionally a comment for others.

data.name: Milestone_NextMilestone_Next_Milestone__for_chain__Helptext
data.value: The next milestone for chained ones. This is an option to optimize the process.

data.name: TermSet_Culture_Assigned_Culture_Helptext
data.value: Each text has a primary language. Only those termsets with the right language are accessible to authors.

data.name: Template_InternalName_Internal_Name_Helptext
data.value: The internal name is the documents name that is referenced from main document.xml.

data.name: ContentCollection_Public_Collection_is_Public_Helptext
data.value: This collection is publicity visible to all other users of the platform. Use this to share your "fancy" collections with others. Sharing successful collections will let you participate on the revenues made by authors from selling these texts.

data.name: ContentCollection_Shared_Shared_Collection_Helptext
data.value: This collection is shared among all groups you're a member of

data.name: ContactModel_EMail_The_e_mail_is_not_properly_formatted_Helptext
data.value: The e-mail is not properly formatted

data.name: ContactModel_Message_Consider_writing_us_what_s_the_purpose_of_you_contact__Helptext
data.value: Consider writing us what's the purpose of you contact.

data.name: ContactModel_Message_Type_at_least_a_few_characters_here__Helptext
data.value: Type at least a few characters here.

data.name: Message_Subject_Subject_Helptext
data.value: The subject of the message, something useful in lists.

data.name: Work_Extern_External_Helptext
data.value: Shows the source this library entry was derived from.

data.name: Published_Starred_Simple_star_to_rank_the_work_Helptext
data.value: Simple star to rank the work

data.name: Published_Catalogs_Catalogs_Helptext
data.value: Categories support the appearance in catalogs such as Amazon. Choose any number to place your text perfectly. The language of the catagories follows the language of the work (see 1. Description). Change the language accordingly the target catalog.
data.comment: Kategorien für die Eintragung in unserem Katalog, aber auch für Amazon und ähnliche Shops. Wähle mehrere aus, um das Werk optimal zu platzieren. Die Sprache des Katalogs folgt der für das Werk ausgewählten Sprache (siehe 1. Beschreibung). Ändere die Sprache, um den passenden Katalog zu nutzen.

data.name: Published_CoverImage_Cover_Image_Helptext
data.value: The cover is for both, EPUB and print. In Apps it's the basis for an icon. The background image is the current default production template. If you want to upload a cover, it must be 5.8" x 9.8" (A5) and has a resolution of 300 dpi (1748 x 2452 pixel). The descriptive text (title, author) must be on the image already.
data.comment: Das Coverbild wird als Deckblat für EPUBs und als Grundlage für den Druck benutzt. In Apps wird ein vergleichbares Icon in den angegebenen Farben und Schriftarten erstellt. Das Hintergrundbild folgt der Standardvorlage, die dem Projekt zugewiesen wurde. Wenn ein Coverbild hochgeladen wird, muss es 148mm breit und 250mm hoch mit 300 dpi sein (1748 x 2452 Pixel). Die Beschriftung (Titel, Autor) muss wie beim generierten Cover bereits im Bild erfolgen.

data.name: Published_NavLevel_Navigation_Level_Helptext
data.value: The levels provides for navigation in EPUB documents or depth of ToC in printed books.

data.name: ExternalPublisher_KindleCreativeCommon_Confirm_Rights_Helptext
data.value: Put the text under the Creative Common license.

data.name: QuickCreate_Name_Content_Name_Helptext
data.value: Provide a name for your very first project. You can change this later.

data.name: QuickCreate_UseDefaults_Use_default_settings_Helptext
data.value: Default is a simple article with one chapter for immediate publishing. You can change all settings later at any time.

data.name: QuickForm_Name_Your_name_Helptext
data.value: Your name or nickname as shown in dialogs.

data.name: QuickForm_Email_Your_email_Helptext
data.value: Provide a valid email address where you can receive messages.

data.name: QuickForm_ProjectName_Project_proposal_name_Helptext
data.value: Give your oroject proposal a neat name so we know what you're intendet to do.

data.name: QuickForm_Phone_Phone_Helptext
data.value: Please give us a phone number so we can call you back for further assisting.

data.name: Opus_Version_Version_Helptext
data.value: The version of the text, this is just to distinguish between iterations or issues of similar purpose. Can be left untouched.

data.name: Opus_Active_Active_Helptext
data.value: Whether the text is active and accessible by contributors.

data.name: LocalizedHierarchyBase_LocaleId_Culture_Helptext
data.value: The primary language of the text

data.name: Discussion_Subject_Subject_Helptext
data.value: The threads subject or theme, a short descriptive text is helpful here.

data.name: Project_Name_Project_Name_Helptext
data.value: The name of the project. This is being used internally only.

data.name: Message_Receiver_Receiver_Helptext
data.value: One or more receivers of this message. Start typing to see suggestions.

data.name: Term_Content_Content_Helptext
data.value: The content as it appears in advanced dialogs

data.name: Term_TermType_Term_Type_Helptext
data.value: The type of term, controls its behavior

data.name: Term_Text_Name_or_Text_Helptext
data.value: The name as it appears in preview or menus

data.name: Project_ApproveTerms_Must_approve_Helptext
data.value: If this option is checked, contributors must actively approve the terms before they become part of the team.

data.name: Project_Description_Verbose_Description_Helptext
data.value: A verbose description of the project's content.

data.name: Project_Short_Short_Description_Helptext
data.value: A short description that helps your fellow contributors

data.name: Project_Terms_Terms_for_Contributors_Helptext
data.value: The terms contributors must confirm before participating.

data.name: Element_Variation_Variation_Helptext
data.value: If you create a new version, you can determine what type of variation it is compared with the previous one.

data.name: Element_MatchMatrix_Match_Matrix_Helptext
data.value: The matrix determines how user can find this particular content. The matching helps searching and getting the right stuff. The more keywords the better the content's visibility.

data.name: UserProfile_FacebookProfile_Facebook_Profile_Helptext
data.value: The URL of your Facebook profile

data.name: UserProfile_OtherProfile_Other_Profile_Helptext
data.value: The URL of any other profile you wish to show others

data.name: UserProfile_XingProfile_Xing_Profile_Helptext
data.value: The URL of your Xing profile

data.name: UserProfile_FacebookProfile_Facebook__Helptext
data.value: The adress (URL) of your Facebook profile

data.name: ChangePassword_OldPassword_You_must_provide_the_current_password
data.value: You must provide the current password

data.name: ChangePassword_NewPassword_You_must_provide_a_new_password
data.value: You must provide a new password

data.name: RetrievePassword_UserName_Please_provide_your_username_or_email
data.value: Please provide your username or email

data.name: RetrievePassword_PasswordAnswer_The_answer_for_your_password_retrieval_question
data.value: The answer for your password retrieval question

data.name: LogOn_UserName_You_must_provide_your_username_or_email
data.value: You must provide your username or email

data.name: Register_Email_You_must_provide_an_email_address
data.value: You must provide an email address

data.name: Register_Roles_The_roles_shall_be_set_properly
data.value: The roles shall be set properly

data.name: Published_Authors_Authors_Helptext
data.value: The Authors of the text, as they appear on the title or in catalogues.

data.name: Published_Publisher_Publisher_Helptext
data.value: The publisher's name, as it appears in catalogues and on covers. If empty it's texxtoor itself.

data.name: QuickForm_FavoriteRole_Favorite_Role_Helptext
data.value: What is your favorite role while experiencing our platform? You can change this at any time later.

data.name: Project_Name_Description
data.value: A more verbose description of this project that helps contributors to understand the goal.

data.name: Project_Name_InternalDescription
data.value: A brief description for internal purposes

data.name: Discussion_Closed_Closed_Audience_Helptext
data.value: This topic is for closed group members only

data.name: OrderProduct_Media_Media_Helptext
data.value: Decide on what media you want to get the content. Choose multiple medias in one step. Some media may require paying a fee.

data.name: OrderProduct_Subscription_Subscription_Helptext
data.value: A subscription gives you instant access to all future updates of all chosen media. This is a monthly fee. You can terminate the subscription at any time.

data.name: OrderProduct_RealPrice_Real_Price_Helptext
data.value: The final, binding price you pay for all media ordered. This includes shipping and handling, insurances, production and packaging.

data.name: Register_ConfirmPassword_The_password_given_does_not_match_the_password_typed_above
data.value: The password given does not match the password typed above

data.name: Discussion_Tags_Tags_Helptext
data.value: Tags help organizing questions in groups (tag clouds). Just provide a few words, separeted by commas.

data.name: QuestionsAnswers_Theme_Theme_Helptext
data.value: A theme helps organizing questions and their relevance for the addressed author.

data.name: QuestionsAnswers_Work_Work_Helptext
data.value: The work this question is relevant for. It's used internally to get the author or author's team.

data.name: Published_PreferredTemplateGroup_Preferred_Template_Group_Helptext
data.value: The group of templates being used to create the user's output as PDF, in print, EPUB, and so on.

data.name: RunControl_RunMode_Run_Mode_Helptext
data.value: The mode the application runs in. Can be set by admin only.

data.name: RunControl_Complexity_Complexity_Helptext
data.value: The complexity, simple of full, set by user or preset.

data.name: AddressBook_Region_Region_Helptext
data.value: The region or district you live in.

data.name: UserProfile_AwardState_Award_Helptext
data.value: An additional value that counts explicit awards and adds to both scores.

data.name: UserProfile_UserScore_UserScore_Helptext
data.value: The User Score is the summary of all activities and the award state and valid for all users.

data.name: UserProfile_CreatorScore_CreatorScore_Helptext
data.value: The Creator Score counts activities particularly for authors and contributors and reflects success and reputation.

data.name: UserProfile_UserBadge_UserBadge_Helptext
data.value: The User Badge shows the level an user has according to his or her score.

data.name: UserProfile_CreatorBadge_CreatorBadge_Helptext
data.value: The Creator Badge shows the level an author has according to his or her score.

data.name: PeerReview_Level_Level_Helptext
data.value: Level, a higher value is better

data.name: Opus_Name_The_text_must_have_distinct_name_
data.value: The text must have distinct name.

data.name: WorkroomChat_Closed_Thread_Closed_Helptext
data.value: This thread has ended and does not allow answers.

data.name: OrderStore_FullFillment_Fullfillment_State_Helptext
data.value: The current state of the order process

data.name: Project_Team_Team_Helptext
data.value: The team that is associated to this project. Choose an exiting team (which can run multiple projects) or select * Create New Team * to build one dedicated to this project.

data.name: ImprintAddress_Url_If_provided_it_must_match_URL_Format
data.value: If provided it must match URL Format

data.name: LocalizedEntityBase_Culture_Culture_Helptext
data.value: The language of this element. If the output is particular to a specific language, the language specific version of this item is used.

data.name: AccountController_Register_An_account_with_this_email_already_exists_
data.value: An account with this email already exists

data.name: RegisterViewModel_Phone_FormatError
data.value: The phone number must contain characters but digits, dashes, and slashes.

data.name: Opus_IsBoilerplate_Is_Boilerplate_Helptext
data.value: Once a text is marked as boilerplate all of the chapters can be used as a boilerplate. You can copy the boilerplate chapters one by one to any other text of all of your projects. The boilerplate text itself behaves like any other text.

data.name: Project_Image_Image_Helptext
data.value: An Image that illustrates the project for your contributors. This is also the default for any published text's cover or icon. It can be replaced while publishing.

data.name: Project_Active_Is_active_Helptext
data.value: The project is currently active and is accessible. Once deactivated the contributors cannot access the project.

data.name: Opus_Name_Text_Name_Helptext
data.value: The text's internal name. Helps organising your texts and selection on the publishing process.

data.name: Opus_Requirements_Requirements_Helptext
data.value: The requirements and prerequisits the user needs to use this text properly.

data.name: Opus_RequirementsResource_Requirements_Image_Helptext
data.value: A supporting image that shows the requirements, such as a set of tools.

data.name: Opus_ProposedOutcome_Proposed_Outcome_Helptext
data.value: The proposed outcome, the results or other informations the author promises.

data.name: Opus_ProposedOutcomeResource_Proposed_Outcome_Image_Helptext
data.value: A supporting image, such as the finally created product.

data.name: Opus_TargetAudience_Target_Audience_Helptext
data.value: A description of the target audience this text is written for.

data.name: PeerReview_Approved_Approve_Review_Helptext
data.value: Check this value to approve the review. The review will become publicity available immediately.
